title: Zion National Park: Lodging and Food Services
body: Lodging and Food Services        Zion Lodge           Zion LodgeThree miles north on the Zion Canyon Scenic Drive. Open year-round. Motel rooms, cabins, and suites available. Zion Lodge also has a gift shop and post office. Reservations recommended: 1-888-297-2757         Red Rock Grill Dining Room at Zion LodgeOpen year round. Dinner reservations are advised spring through fall: 435-772-3213.Castle Dome Cafe at Zion LodgeOpen seasonally.      Additional Lodging and Food Services Outside the Park Other lodging is available in Springdale, Rockville, Mt. Carmel Junction, Hurricane, St. George and Kanab. For more area lodging and food service information visit:    Zion Canyon Visitors Bureau   East Zion Tourism Council    St. George Area Visitor Bureau   Kane County, Utah
